Kamal Hosni (1929年; Arabic) bụ aha egwu nke Kamall Eldin Mohammed, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Egypt
Ka ọ na-etolite, o chere na ihe nkiri bụ ọkpụkpọ ya
O kpebiri ịhapụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mgbe naanị ihe nkiri ya (Rabee El Hob) gasịrị n'afọ 1955.
Hosni gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Commerce wee rụọ ọrụ na National Bank of Egypt.
Ọ hụrụ ma na-abụ abụ nke Mohamed Abdel Wahab, Farid al-Atrash n'anya.
Onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Mary Queeny họọrọ ya maka ọrụ bụ isi na Rabee El Hob
A họọrọ Kamal Husni dịka aha egwu ya
N'afọ 1955, Hosni so Shadia, Shoukry Sarhan na Hussain Riad mee ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọ bụrụ abụ "Ghali Alia", ya na Shadia "Lao Salimtak Alby"
Hosni wee kpebie ịla ezumike nká na nka
Ọ kwagara London ịrụ ọrụ maka ndị ọchụnta ego
Ọ laghachiri Egypt na ngwụcha afọ iri itoolu wee dekọọ abụ okpukpe.
Ọ zutere nwunye ya Busanya na ụlọ akụ ebe ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbe ahụ
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ, Nader (n'aha nwa Mary Queeny)
A gụrụ ụmụ ha nwoke abụọ nke nta aha abụ Shadya 'Ahmed And Mohammed Shargaloony'..
Kamal Hosni nwụrụ na 1 Eprel 2005, na Cairo.
